alert.note: Alert for Latimer (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 10 at 8:01AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Pushmataha, southeastern Haskell, central Latimer, north central Choctaw and central Le Flore Counties through 845 AM CDT... At 801 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Mc Curtain to 8 miles southwest of Moyers. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations in or near the path include... Poteau... Antlers... Clayton... Panama... Talihina... Wister... Howe... Red Oak... Mccurtain... Bokoshe... Fanshawe... Rattan... Cameron... Albion... Talimena State Park... Snow... Tuskahoma... Mc Curtain... Stanley... Kiamichi... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
